definitions.definition: An instance of processing something in brine or in vinegar .
A process by which the oxide scale on steel (especially stainless steels) or other metallic objects is chemically removed by strong acids.

main_definition: An instance of processing something in brine or in vinegar .
secondary_definitions: A process by which the oxide scale on steel (especially stainless steels) or other metallic objects is chemically removed by strong acids.
